bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with bi yuan 鼻淵 , nasal deep-source [outflow]. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry si gua 絲瓜 quoting Yi xue zheng chuan 醫學正傳 5: 鼻中時時流臭黃水 , “Malodorous yellow water constantly flows from inside the nose”, writes: 腦崩流汁：鼻中時時流臭黃 水 , “ Brain collapse with liquid flow: Malodorous yellow water constantly flows from inside the nose”.
